name: initialize_jar
body: let jar = & mut ctx . accounts . jar ;
jar . creator = ctx . accounts . creator . key () ;
jar . total_tips = 0 ;

name: tip
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . tip_payer . is_signer , ErrorCode :: Unauthorized) ;
require ! (amount > 0 , ErrorCode :: InvalidAmount) ;
let jar = & mut ctx . accounts . jar ;
jar . total_tips = jar . total_tips . checked_add (amount) . unwrap () ;
msg ! ("â¤ {} tipped {} units. New total: {}" , ctx . accounts . tip_payer . key () , amount , jar . total_tips) ;

name: withdraw
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . creator . is_signer , ErrorCode :: Unauthorized) ;
let jar = & mut ctx . accounts . jar ;
require ! (jar . total_tips > 0 , ErrorCode :: NoTipsLeft) ;
let to_send = jar . total_tips ;
jar . total_tips = 0 ;
msg ! ("ğŸ’° {} withdrew {} units" , ctx . accounts . creator . key () , to_send) ;

name: view_balance
body: let jar = & ctx . accounts . jar ;
msg ! ("TipJar for {} has {} units" , jar . creator , jar . total_tips) ;
